#cloud-config

apt_update: true
apt_upgrade: true
packages:
 - cowsay
 - python-pip
 - python-dev
 - build-essential
 - cowsay
byobu_default: system

# add each entry to ~/.ssh/authorized_keys for the configured user or the
# first user defined in the user definition directive.
ssh_authorized_keys:
  - ssh-rsa  tim@student-213-27.eduroam.uu.se

write_files:
  - path: /home/ubuntu/cowsay-app.py
    content: |
      from flask import Flask, jsonify
      import subprocess
      import sys
      app = Flask(__name__)
      @app.route('/cowsay/api/v1.0/saysomething', methods=['GET'])
      def cow_say():
          data=subprocess.check_output(["/usr/games/cowsay","Hello student"])
          return data
      if __name__ == '__main__':
          app.run(host='0.0.0.0',debug=True)

runcmd:
 - echo "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/games" >> /home/ubuntu/.bashrc  
 - source /home/ubuntu/.bashrc
 - pip install Flask
 - python /home/ubuntu/cowsay-app.py &
